attributes.action: Press Plymouth City Council to Build the long awaited Plymstock Community Swimming Pool in central Plymstock sooner rather than later
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please support the building of a Community Swimming Pool in central Plymstock Plymouth.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Press Plymouth City Council to Build the long awaited Plymstock Community Swimming Pool in central Plymstock sooner rather than later."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20256


Prime Minister's Office
